column1: The key to this game is your ability to take advantage of its great strengths. Each of its eight weaknesses is unique, and you must master them to stay resilient and hold your position. You can either choose to ignore its strengths or use it to your advantage, or you can try to build a strategy that lets you win.
The game begins with an attack. If you do not immediately attack, you are left to defend yourself, if you do, you are left to defend yourself.
You must quickly use your attacks to regain some of your strength. If you choose to attack, you are left to defend yourself, if you do, you are left to defend yourself.
You must quickly use your moves to get more distance. If you do not immediately move, you are left to defend yourself. If you do not immediately move, you are left to defend yourself.
The game ends with the player taking a long rest. You must wait until the last minute to complete your move.
You must use your powers to make your way to the next room. If you do not wait to reach the next room, you are left to defend yourself, if you do, you are left to defend yourself.
You must use your abilities to move to the next room. If you do not move, you are left to defend yourself, if you do, you are left to defend yourself.
You must use your abilities to move to the next room. If you do not move, you are left to defend yourself, if you do, you are left to defend yourself.

The game ends with the player losing a battle. You must wait until the last minute to complete an attack. If you do not wait to reach the next room, you are left to defend yourself, if you do, you are left to defend yourself.
